articles.author: Mari Eccles
articles.title: Ozempic cut heavy drinking in clinical study - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The small study suggests there’s promise in further investigating the drug in this field.
articles.content: The U.S. researchers said the results justify larger clinical trials to evaluate this class of drugs known as glucagon-like peptide 1 (GLP-1) receptor agonists for alcohol use disorder. The study is … [+785 chars]
